meanings: (기억 속에서 지워 버리다) forget, put[get] sb[sth] out of one's mind[head]
forget, put[get] sb[sth] out of one's mind[head]

vlive.korean: 근데 자다가 마스크팩 떼는 것도 잊어버리시는 분들도 많죠? But there are many people who forget to remove the mask while sleeping, right? 듣기 View video HANABONO : 김장배추만 절이니? 난 피부를 수분에 절인다! k-products that actually works
vlive.english: But there are many people who forget to remove the mask while sleeping, right?

vlive.korean: 바로 잊어버렸죠? I forgot right away. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 스테이 오랜만에 반가웠어요♡ (소리나오나용?) ㅋㅋ
뭐 잊어먹은 거 없어? Didn't you forget something? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 몽슈슈 글로벌하우스 E12. [사랑하면 결투하자!]
마지막 그냥 잊어주시면... Please forget that part. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 도망갈까..! 🏃
이렇게 또... - 벌써 잊어버렸죠? Oh... - You already forgot right? 듣기 View video NCT : 벌써 콘서트 후유증💚💚
